home-header-description: Upload a photo of the nutrition fact label from your food product, and our AI-powered Nutrition Analyzer will analyze it for you, providing personalized suggestions!
nutrition-result-loading-description: Just a few more seconds while we analyze your nutrition facts...
how_to_use_title: How to Use IngredWise Nutrition Analyzer
how_to_use_subtitle: It's easy! Just follow these simple steps:
how_to_use_step1_description: Capture a clear photo of the nutrition fact label on the food product you want to analyze.
how_to_use_step2_description: Upload the photo to our Nutrition Analyzer, and wait a few seconds for the analysis to complete.
how_to_use_step3_description: IngredWise will display the analyzed nutrition facts and provide real-time personalized suggestions generated by our advanced AI technology.
how_to_use_step4_description: While we strive for accuracy, please be aware that our service is not perfect and the information provided is for reference purposes only. Always consult a healthcare professional for personalized dietary advice.
